Title(s): The Cuckoo Song; Svmer is icumen in
_description: The Cuckoo Song — fourteen irregular lines

BLHar978.First Lines: Svmer is icumen inLhude sing cuccu…
BLHar978.Last Lines:
…Wel singes þu cuccuNe swik þu nauer nuSing
                    cuccu nu sing cuccuSing cuccu sing cuccu nu
